title: SCP-4127
content:
[[include :scp-wiki-cn:credit:start-standalone]]
**SCP-4127：**Heads or Tails
**作者：**[[*user the great hippo]]
**圖片：** [https://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/File:Buffalo_nickles.jpg 連結]。

**音樂：** [https://youtu.be/I2RXgHfqYx0 Right Back Where We Started From] (Sinitta)

**譯者：**[[*user feitag]]
----
